minor.monster_crowd_control_resist: monster crowd control resist crowd control duration vs monsters is reduced by .
minor.monster_critical_resist: monster critical resist monster attacks reduce the damage of your critical strikes for seconds by , stacking up to .
minor.monster_overpower_resist: monster overpower resist monster attacks reduce the damage of your next overpower attack by . stacking up to .
minor.monster_vulnerable_resist: monster vulnerable resist duration of vulnerable effects vs monsters is reduced by .
minor.backstabbers: backstabbers close monster attacks from behind cause you to become vulnerable.
minor.monster_attack_speed: monster attack speed monsters attack faster.
minor.monster_barrier: monster barrier monsters gain of their maximum life as a barrier.
minor.barrier_breakers: barrier breakers monsters deal more damage to barriers.
minor.slowing_projectiles: slowing projectiles monster attacks from a distance have a chance to slow targets.
minor.resource_burn: resource burn after you spend resource, you burn an additional of the resource spent for every time you were hit by a distant enemy.
minor.monster_bleeding_damage: monster bleeding damage monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as bleeding over seconds.
minor.monster_burning_damage: monster burning damage monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as burning over seconds.
minor.monster_cold_damage: monster cold damage monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as cold.
minor.monster_shadow_damage_over_time: monster shadow damage over time monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as shadow over seconds.
minor.monster_fire_damage: monster fire damage monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as fire.
minor.monster_lightning_damage: monster lightning damage monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as lightning.
minor.monster_poison_damage: monster poison damage monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as poison over seconds.
minor.monster_shadow_damage: monster shadow damage monsters deal an additional of their physical damage dealt as shadow.
minor.monster_life: monster life monsters gain extra life.
minor.monster_regen: monster regen nonboss monsters regen maximum life per second.
minor.monster_bleed_resist: monster bleed resist monsters take less bleeding damage.
minor.monster_burning_resist: monster burning resist monsters take less burning damage.
minor.monster_cold_resist: monster cold resist monsters take less cold damage.
minor.monster_shadow_damage_over_time_resist: monster shadow damage over time resist monsters take reduced damage from your shadow damage over time effects.
minor.monster_fire_resist: monster fire resist monsters take less fire damage.
minor.monsters_lightning_resist: monsters lightning resist monsters take less lightning damage.
minor.melee_defenders: melee defenders monsters take less damage from close targets
minor.monster_physical_resist: monster physical resist monsters take less physical damage.
minor.monster_poison_resist: monster poison resist monsters take less poison damage.
minor.ranged_defenders: ranged defenders monsters take less damage from distant targets.
minor.monster_shadow_resist: monster shadow resist monsters take less shadow damage.
minor.monster_life_steal: monster life steal nonboss monsters gain life steal.
minor.dodge_breakers: dodge breakers monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by for seconds, stacking up to .
minor.potion_breakers: potion breakers monster attacks from a distance increase the cooldown of your next potion by seconds, up to seconds.
minor.resistance_breakers: resistance breakers monster attacks from a distance reduce resistance to all elements by for seconds, stacking up to .
minor.monster_thorns: monster thorns monsters reflect of damage.
minor.armor_breakers: armor breakers monster attacks from a distance reduce your armor by for seconds, stacking up to .
minor.fire_traps: fire traps additional fire traps appear in this dungeon.
minor.unstoppable_monsters: unstoppable monsters monsters become unstoppable when life drops below .

major.avenger: avenger killing a monster enrages monsters near it after a short delay, making them deal more damage.
major.blood_blister: blood blister killing a monster has a chance to spawn a blood blister. after a short time, it explodes, dealing heavy area damage.
major.death_pulse: death pulse killing a monster releases a deadly shadow pulse after a short delay.
major.drifting_shade: drifting shade drifting shade chases players. upon reaching them, it explodes for heavy damage and creates a nightmare field that dazes victims.
major.elemental_totems: elemental totems elemental totems occasionally spawn in combat that buff close enemies after seconds if not destroyed.
major.empowered_elites_shock_lance: empowered elites shock lance elites always have the "electric lance" affix.
major.empowered_elites_cold_enchanted: empowered elites cold enchanted elites always have the "cold enchanted" affix.
major.empowered_elites_poison_enchanted: empowered elites poison enchanted elites always have the "poison enchanted" affix.
major.empowered_elites_shadow_enchanted: empowered elites shadow enchanted elites always have the "shadow enchanted" affix.
major.empowered_elites_suppressor: empowered elites suppressor elites always have the "suppressor" affix.
major.empowered_elites_teleporter: empowered elites teleporter elites always have the "teleporter" affix.
major.lightning_storm: lightning storm lightning gathers above the player. get into the protection dome to avoid severe outcomes.
major.nightmare_portal: nightmare portal while in combat, nightmare portals open randomly near players, pouring out dangerous monsters.
major.stormbanes_wrath: stormbanes wrath stormbanes wrath chases players around, releasing deadly pulses when reaching a player.
major.volcanic: volcanic while in combat, gouts of flame periodically erupt near players.

positive.quick_killer: quick killer killing a monster grants attack and move speed. stacking up to .
positive.reduce_cooldowns_on_kill: reduce cooldowns on kill killing a monster reduces your cooldowns by . seconds.
positive.battle_hardened: battle hardened gain damage reduction for every health you are missing.
positive.poisonous_evade: poisonous evade using evade leaves a damaging pool of poison under the first enemy you evade through or at your destination.
positive.nudging_evade: nudging evade using evade pushes enemies back.
positive.extra_shrines: extra shrines extra shrines will appear in the dungeon.
positive.fire_damage: fire damage you deal more fire damage.
positive.frost_damage: frost damage you deal more frost damage.
positive.gold_find: gold find you find more gold.
positive.increased_critical_strike: increased critical strike your critical strike chance is increased by .
positive.increased_healing: increased healing your healing received is increased by .
positive.lightning_damage: lightning damage you deal more lightning damage.
positive.magic_find: magic find you find more items from enemies.
positive.lightning_caller: lightning caller you occasionally call down lightning strikes that damage nearby enemies.
positive.physical_damage: physical damage you deal more physical damage.
positive.poison_damage: poison damage you deal more poison damage
positive.shadow_damage: shadow damage you deal more shadow damage.
positive.control_impaired_explosions: control impaired explosions being hit by control impairing effects creates an explosion around you.
positive.thorns: thorns after attacking an enemy, your thorns are increased by for seconds, up to at max stacks.
positive.ancestors_favour: extra lunar shrines and more glyph experience earned at the end of this dungeon.
